titleStmt.title: The answer of both Hovses of Parliament to His Majesties message of the 12 of November with His Majesties reply thereunto.
His Majesties declaration to all his loving subjects, of his true intentions in advancing lately to Brainceford
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament.
England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)

notesStmt.note: Wing erroneously lists this work as Madan 1086.
Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
With: His Majesties declaration / Oxford [s.n.], 1642. Great Britain. Sovereigns, etc. 1625-1649 (Charles I)
